messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] list ownership transfer dissolved the list!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, We just returned home from a powwow -what a great time we had!! Wow - the activity here....and the changes!! Janis ... From: Heidi To:
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
We just returned home from a powwow -what a great time we had!! Wow - the activity here....and the changes!!
Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: Heidi
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 31, 2003 10:56 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] list ownership transfer dissolved the list!


hello?

is the list still here? when I try to get here via my favorites, it
tells me there is no such list

got a message in my inbox about my last post: you tried to post this
to a list that doesn't exist.

????

HeidiC

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] list ownership transfer dissolved the list!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi -- The list is still here. The name has been changed -- remove the dash that used to be between Unschooling and Discussion so the list name is now
messages.messageBody:
Hi --

The list is still here. The name has been changed -- remove the "dash" that used to be between Unschooling and Discussion so the list name is now UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com.


Joyce and Sandra and I have sent a lovely thank you to Helen and hello to the list, as new owners, but it seems to have disappeared into the cyberfog for now.

This is a big list - I'm guessing that updating a name change takes a while longer for big lists like this.

Everybody should change their favorite places/bookmarks, address books, and rules or filters and mailboxes/folders as necessary to reflect the new list name.

Other than that -- carry on.......

Pam Sorooshian

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] list ownership transfer dissolved the list!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/31/03 11:23:52 PM, bunsofaluminum60@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/31/03 11:23:52 PM, bunsofaluminum60@... writes:

<<

got a message in my inbox about my last post: you tried to post this

to a list that doesn't exist. >>

If it had a hyphen in it (Unschooling-Discussion) it will bounce and the only
way to get it through is to cut and paste and mail to

UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com

There are several things which were mailed to this list earlier this evening
which haven't come through. I hope it will shake loose.

I'm guessing Yahoo is sludged up somehow. My website is a geocities site and
I've had a hard time getting pages to open. Sometimes they do, and sometimes
they don't.

Sandra
